com.fasterxml.storemate.store.util

Class PartitionedWriteMutex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.storemate.store.util.PartitionedWriteMutex

  • public class PartitionedWriteMutex
extends Object
    Object used to implement mutex for write operations (usually PUT and DELETE) using N-way key-based partitions; such that only a single active operation is allowed per partition.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PartitionedWriteMutex.Callback<T>
      Callback used by partitioner.

      protected Semaphore[] _semaphores
      Underlying semaphores used for locking

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartitionedWriteMutex

        public PartitionedWriteMutex(int n,
                     boolean fair)
        Parameters:
        n - Minimum number of partitions (rounded up to next power of 2)
        fair - Whether underlying semaphores should be fair or not; fair ones have more overhead, but mostly (only?) for contested access, not uncontested
